messageJson.content: I am capable of analyzing corporate finance, formulating management strategies, and simulating future values. Additionally, I have experience in proposing regional revitalization plans.
I possess expertise in developing web applications and Android/IOS apps using Flutter.
I have experience using Python for tasks such as data analysis, data visualization through graphics, and constructing a model of the Department of Mechanics.
I have expertise in design, building web applications using Python, Node.js and React.js.
